name: Sushi Secret
description:
Ludum Dare Theme

The More You Have, The Worse It Is

Quick Brief

Are you ready for an action-packed, survival-horror game with a twist at every corner? Good! Here at Secret Sushi Games TM we are all about that. Collect the sushi in the trays and send them off to the customers; but don't let too much sushi go through on it's own. Free sushi? That's bad for business!

See how long you can last and collect that sushi!

Quick Controls

Use your mouse to click and drag objects, collect sushi into the trays and drag them back onto the conveyor belt. Throw anything that's not sushi away, you don't want that getting out to the customers!

Features

Loot Crates!

Enjoy a nice relaxing (and rewarding time) opening loot crates that you earned during the game! We did this to give players a sense of pride and accomplishment.
